text: The surgeon used a scalpel to make the initial incision.
The procedure identified the heart and surrounding arteries.
The surgeon demonstrated excellent skill during the procedure.
The scalpel was used to make precise cuts at specific locations.
The surgeon explained each step of the procedure thoroughly.
The reflection on the procedure provided insights into the technique used.
The critique highlighted areas where the surgery could be improved.
The recommendation was to use a different technique to improve outcomes.
